Key Match Events: Lionel Messi scored twice and assisted on another goal
Guatemala took a surprise lead in the fourth minute
Lautaro Martinez scored twice for Argentina
Messi finished the scoring in the 77th
Others: Argentina outclassed Guatemala 4-1 on Friday night to complete its 2024 Copa America preparations
Going the distance also gave Messi reps with 15 Argentina field players during the match

The lead lasted only eight minutes after Messi tied it when Guatemala goalkeeper Nicholas Hagen's errant pass found the eight-time Ballon d’Or winner directly in front of an open goal about 12 yards out
Scaloni said through an interpreter. “That was basically the idea, maybe to look for something different, a chance to improve.”
